name: Gravity Game (Brunofgm7)
description:
Gravity Game is an 2d game made with Unity in which you control a ninja. The objective of the game is to complete all 3 levels  with 3 coins each level, pressing anywhere on screen to change gravity and avoid being stuck in the map or falling.

This game is still a work in progress. This is a demo showcasing the gameplay . It features the first three levels of the game.
